projects.name: ConvoHub
projects.description: Engineered a feature-rich web platform with real-time messaging and efficient chat room management, enhancing message delivery speed by 35%. Optimized authentication process with JWT, reducing authentication time by 40% and ensuring secure user sessions. Utilized ES6+ syntax to enhance code readability and conciseness by 40%

projects.name: TechCommerce
projects.description: Architected a high-performance E-Commerce website. Enhanced product search functionality using MongoDBs full-text search, improving search accuracy by 20%. Implemented user authentication and authorization using JWT and bcrypt achieving a 95.9% security compliance rate.

projects.name: CodeMate
projects.description: Designed an online code editor with syntax highlighting for 5 languages, achieving a 40% reduction in initial page load time improved developer efficiency by 50% and decreased project timelines by 20%.

projects.name: TechTussle
projects.description: Developed a tic-tac-toe game showcasing proficiency in front-end web development. Integrated features such as player vs computer gameplay, game logic for player moves and win detection. Reduced game load time by 30% through optimized JavaScript code and efficient use of CSS.

experiences.description: Leveraged proficiency in [Node.js,Express.js,React etc.] to develop robust and scalable web applications, ensuring seamless user experiences.

full_output.name: Chhavi Patel
